internal.content:
---
title: Run Manage Tools
---           

- An admin pod gets deployed when Manage is deployed.
- The command “kubectl exec” can be executed on the admin pod container or directly use the container terminal to run the tools such as integrity checker.
- Tools logged to stdout will be forwarded to Elasticsearch, Fluentd, and Kibana (EFK) stack if configured.

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Run Manage Tools
---           

- An admin pod gets deployed when Manage is deployed.
- The command “kubectl exec” can be executed on the admin pod container or directly use the container terminal to run the tools such as integrity checker.
- Tools logged to stdout will be forwarded to Elasticsearch, Fluentd, and Kibana (EFK) stack if configured.
